speaker: QUINCE
text: Have you sent to Bottom’s house? Is he come

speaker: QUINCE
text: home yet?

speaker: STARVELING
text: He cannot be heard of. Out of doubt he

speaker: STARVELING
text: is transported.

speaker: FLUTE
text: If he come not, then the play is marred. It goes

speaker: FLUTE
text: not forward, doth it?

speaker: QUINCE
text: It is not possible. You have not a man in all

speaker: QUINCE
text: Athens able to discharge Pyramus but he.

speaker: FLUTE
text: No, he hath simply the best wit of any handicraftman

speaker: FLUTE
text: in Athens.

speaker: QUINCE
text: Yea, and the best person too, and he is a very

speaker: QUINCE
text: paramour for a sweet voice.

speaker: FLUTE
text: You must say “paragon.” A “paramour” is (God

speaker: FLUTE
text: bless us) a thing of naught.

speaker: SNUG
text: Masters, the Duke is coming from the temple,

speaker: SNUG
text: and there is two or three lords and ladies more

speaker: SNUG
text: married. If our sport had gone forward, we had all

speaker: SNUG
text: been made men.

speaker: FLUTE
text: O, sweet bully Bottom! Thus hath he lost sixpence

speaker: FLUTE
text: a day during his life. He could not have

speaker: FLUTE
text: ’scaped sixpence a day. An the Duke had not given

speaker: FLUTE
text: him sixpence a day for playing Pyramus, I’ll be

speaker: FLUTE
text: hanged. He would have deserved it. Sixpence a day

speaker: FLUTE
text: in Pyramus, or nothing!

speaker: BOTTOM
text: Where are these lads? Where are these

speaker: BOTTOM
text: hearts?

speaker: QUINCE
text: Bottom! O most courageous day! O most happy

speaker: QUINCE
text: hour!

speaker: BOTTOM
text: Masters, I am to discourse wonders. But ask

speaker: BOTTOM
text: me not what; for, if I tell you, I am not true

speaker: BOTTOM
text: Athenian. I will tell you everything right as it fell

speaker: BOTTOM
text: out.

speaker: QUINCE
text: Let us hear, sweet Bottom.

speaker: BOTTOM
text: Not a word of me. All that I will tell you is that

speaker: BOTTOM
text: the Duke hath dined. Get your apparel together,

speaker: BOTTOM
text: good strings to your beards, new ribbons to your

speaker: BOTTOM
text: pumps. Meet presently at the palace. Every man

speaker: BOTTOM
text: look o’er his part. For the short and the long is, our

speaker: BOTTOM
text: play is preferred. In any case, let Thisbe have clean

speaker: BOTTOM
text: linen, and let not him that plays the lion pare his

speaker: BOTTOM
text: nails, for they shall hang out for the lion’s claws.

speaker: BOTTOM
text: And, most dear actors, eat no onions nor garlic, for

speaker: BOTTOM
text: we are to utter sweet breath, and I do not doubt but

speaker: BOTTOM
text: to hear them say it is a sweet comedy. No more

speaker: BOTTOM
text: words. Away! Go, away!
